name: Scratch Shooter
description:
This was my first game jam project so don't think any AAA type to game .]

note:-To restart this game you need to reload the page

note:- This project might take time to start/load.

please see my youtube channel please subcribe to my channel

. controls:-

 1.movement- up,right,left arrow keys(note:- down arrow will not work) or w,a,d (note:- s will not work)

 2.space to shoot.

3.the health and the bullets might not increase above 180,190 or 200

note:- you might need scratch editor.if you find any bugs please tell me in the comment section..your credit  is not important  .
